# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Television Service – Canadian Police College
**Reference Number**: cb-7218-81868287
**Solicitation Number**: 202400546
**Publication Date**: 2023-07-13
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-29T14:00:00
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Amendment Date**: 2023-08-29

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites submissions for television services to the Canadian Police College (CPC) residences and buildings. 

The contract will be for three years with an optional extension period of up to three years.

## Contract Requirements

*   Television services, including installation and delivery of Full High Definition (FHD) (2K) television services using MPEG4 video and AC3 audio
*   Mandatory site visit on August 2, 2023

## Selection Criteria

*   Lowest Price

## Submissions

*   All submissions must be made through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities>
*   Bidders must regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information

## Prohibited Information Sources

*   Canada is not responsible for any information found on websites of third parties
*   Notice will not be sent if the tenders or documents are amended

## Procedures

*   Indicate methods used for verifying information about industry day and for obtaining proposal documents
*   Completion and submittal of the offer
*   Award and Contract

## Contracting Entity

*   Responsible for the administration and addenda to this contract
*   Is represented by the RCMP Contracting and Procurement Unit
*   Entire liability is borne by the contractor

## Intellectual Property Rights

*   The copyright in all documents submitted to Canada for the solicitation of a supply arrangement is hereby assigned to the Crown
*   The Crown reserves the right to modify any information, although no obligation is deemed to arise otherwise than as set forth in this notice

## Indigenous Procurement Policy

*   Increase visibility and may provide additional business for Indigenous peoples
*   Complete the profile at <https://www.sac-isc.gc.ca/fr/1100100033057/1610797769658>

For inquiries, please contact Megan McCoy at [Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Megan.McCoy@rc
